Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local vPlayer local rightArm local leftArm
local holster local leftSword
Tool.Enabled = true
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
if rightArm:FindFirstChild("TorsoGrip") then local rightGrip = rightArm.TorsoGrip rightGrip.Name = "RightGrip" rightGrip.Part0 = rightArm rightGrip.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, -1.3, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0) end
wait(2.0)
Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm")
if vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Holster") == nil then --[[holster = Instance.new("Part") holster.Name = "Holster" holster.Parent = vCharacter holster.FormFactor = 3 holster.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
local holsterMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") holsterMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=68254867" holsterMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=68254909" holsterMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.1, 1.1, 1.1) holsterMesh.Parent = holster
local holsterGrip = Instance.new("Weld") holsterGrip.Parent = holster holsterGrip.Part1 = holster holsterGrip.Part0 = myTorso holsterGrip.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 1.2) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0, 0) holsterGrip.Name = "HolsterGrip"]] end
while rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") == nil do wait() end
if rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") then local rightGrip = rightArm.RightGrip rightGrip.Part0 = myTorso rightGrip.Name = "TorsoGrip" Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) rightGrip.C1 = CFrame.new(0.369999945, -1.14999998, -0.600000024, 0, -0.669130445, 0.743144751, -1, 1.9490335e-007, 1.75491749e-007, -2.62268344e-007, -0.743144751, -0.669130445) end
if vCharacter:FindFirstChild("LeftSword") == nil then leftSword = Sword:Clone() if leftSword.Mesh then leftSword.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=68258780" end leftSword.Name = "LeftSword" leftSword.Parent = vCharacter
local leftGrip = Instance.new("Weld") leftGrip.Parent = leftArm leftGrip.Name = "LeftGrip" leftGrip.Part0 = myTorso leftGrip.Part1 = leftSword leftGrip.C1 = CFrame.new(-1.03000009, -1.14999986, -1.29999971, 7.07265144e-008, -0.743144751, -0.669130683, 1, 1.93668001e-007, -1.09390982e-007, 2.10882533e-007, -0.669130683, 0.743144751) end end
function onUnequipped() if holster then holster:Destroy() end if leftSword then leftSword:Destroy() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local vPlayer local rightArm local leftArm
local holster local leftSword
local bladesNotActive = true
local unfoldAnim local swingAnim local swordWalk local lungeSlash
Tool.Enabled = true
local damage = 17
-- To gauge key presses local lungeTime = 0 local spinTime = 0
-- game service local r = game:GetService("RunService")
local lastKeyDown = 0 local dashTime = 0 local lastSlash = 0
local newBV = nil
function lungeOnDash(key) key = key:lower() if key == "w" then t = r.Stepped:wait() if (t - lastKeyDown < 0.2) then dashTime = t end lastKeyDown = t end end
function slashIt(hum, torso) lungeSlash = hum:LoadAnimation(Tool["LungeSlash"]) if lungeSlash == nil then Tool.Enabled = true return end
lungeSlash:Play()
local target = hum.TargetPoint local direction = (target - torso.Position) * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) newBV = nil if direction.magnitude > .01 then -- make 'em dash forwards too direction = direction.unit newBV = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") newBV.P = 100000 newBV.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBV.P, 0, newBV.P) newBV.velocity = direction * 50 newBV.Parent = torso
torso.CFrame = CFrame.new(torso.Position, target * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) + Vector3.new(0, torso.Position.Y, 0)) end
wait(.5) if dashSound then dashSound:Play() end if newBV ~= nil then newBV:remove() end wait(.5) end
function blow(hit) local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) wait(1.0) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil and player ~= nil then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid end end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then local tag = humanoid:FindFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag:Remove() end end end
function reMoveBlade() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(-1, 0, 0) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, 0, -1.3) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(-1, 0, 0) end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
if bladesNotActive then bladesNotActive = false unfoldAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool:FindFirstChild("UnfoldAnim")) if unfoldAnim then unfoldAnim:Play() end wait(0.75) while rightArm:FindFirstChild("TorsoGrip") do print("Doing it") local rightGrip = rightArm.TorsoGrip rightGrip.Name = "RightGrip" rightGrip.Part0 = rightArm print(rightGrip.Part0) --rightGrip.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, -1.3, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0) reMoveBlade() wait() end
if leftArm:FindFirstChild("LeftGrip") then local leftGrip = leftArm.LeftGrip leftGrip.Part0 = leftArm leftGrip.C1 = CFrame.new(1, 0, -1.70000005, 0, 1, -4.37113883e-008, 1, 0, 0, 0, -4.37113883e-008, -1) end else local t = r.Stepped:wait() if t - dashTime < 0.2 then slashIt(myHumanoid, myTorso) wait(0.5) amAnimating = false wait(1.5) else swingAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SlashAnim) if swingAnim then swingAnim:Play() end wait(1.0) amAnimating = false end end wait(0.25) Tool.Enabled = true end
function holdBlade() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(-0.7431, 0, 0.6691) --Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0.37, -1.15, -0.6) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(1.51999974, -1.14999998, -1.60000002) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, -1, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0.6691, 0, -0.7431) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(-0.7431, 0, 0.6691) end
function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myHead = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Head") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local myCF = myTorso.CFrame print(myCF)
rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm")
swordWalk = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SwordWalk) if swordWalk then swordWalk:Play() end
if vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Holster") == nil then holster = Instance.new("Part") holster.Name = "Holster" holster.FormFactor = 3 holster.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)
local holsterMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") holsterMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=68254867" holsterMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=68254909" holsterMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.1, 1.1, 1.1) holsterMesh.Parent = holster
local holsterGrip = Instance.new("Weld") holsterGrip.Part1 = holster holsterGrip.Part0 = myTorso holsterGrip.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 1.2) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0, 0) holsterGrip.Name = "HolsterGrip" holsterGrip.Parent = holster holster.Parent = vCharacter end
while rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") == nil do wait() end if rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") then local rightGrip = rightArm.RightGrip --rightGrip.Parent = nil rightGrip.Part0 = myHead rightGrip.Name = "TorsoGrip" Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) print("Setting CFrame") --rightGrip.C1 = CFrame.new(0.369999945, -1.14999998, -0.600000024, 0, -0.669130445, 0.743144751, -1, 1.9490335e-007, 1.75491749e-007, -2.62268344e-007, -0.743144751, -0.669130445) holdBlade() --rightGrip.Parent = rightArm rightGrip.C1 = Tool.Grip --Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0.369999945, -1.14999998, -0.600000024, 0, -0.669130445, 0.743144751, -1, 1.9490335e-007, 1.75491749e-007, -2.62268344e-007, -0.743144751, -0.669130445) --while rightGrip.C1 ~= CFrame.new(0.369999945, -1.14999998, -0.600000024, 0, -0.669130445, 0.743144751, -1, 1.9490335e-007, 1.75491749e-007, -2.62268344e-007, -0.743144751, -0.669130445) do --rightGrip.C1 = CFrame.new(0.369999945, -1.14999998, -0.600000024, 0, -0.669130445, 0.743144751, -1, 1.9490335e-007, 1.75491749e-007, -2.62268344e-007, -0.743144751, -0.669130445) --Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0.369999945, -1.14999998, -0.600000024, 0, -0.669130445, 0.743144751, -1, 1.9490335e-007, 1.75491749e-007, -2.62268344e-007, -0.743144751, -0.669130445) --wait() --end
print("Done Setting CFrame") print(myTorso.CFrame) end
if vCharacter:FindFirstChild("LeftSword") == nil then leftSword = Sword:Clone() if leftSword.Mesh then leftSword.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=68258780" end leftSword.Name = "LeftSword" leftSword.Parent = vCharacter
local leftGrip = Instance.new("Weld") leftGrip.Parent = leftArm leftGrip.Name = "LeftGrip" leftGrip.Part0 = myTorso leftGrip.Part1 = leftSword leftGrip.C1 = CFrame.new(-1.03000009, -1.14999986, -1.29999971, 7.07265144e-008, -0.743144751, -0.669130683, 1, 1.93668001e-007, -1.09390982e-007, 2.10882533e-007, -0.669130683, 0.743144751) while leftGrip.C1 ~= CFrame.new(-1.03000009, -1.14999986, -1.29999971, 7.07265144e-008, -0.743144751, -0.669130683, 1, 1.93668001e-007, -1.09390982e-007, 2.10882533e-007, -0.669130683, 0.743144751) do leftGrip.C1 = CFrame.new(-1.03000009, -1.14999986, -1.29999971, 7.07265144e-008, -0.743144751, -0.669130683, 1, 1.93668001e-007, -1.09390982e-007, 2.10882533e-007, -0.669130683, 0.743144751) wait() end leftSword.Touched:connect(blow) end
--[[while myTorso.CFrame ~= myCF do myTorso.CFrame = myCF wait() end]]
myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 19.0 if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(lungeOnDash) end Tool.GripPos = Tool.GripPos + Vector3.new(0, 0, 0.1) -- Massive hack, what does this even achieve? end
function onUnequipped() if holster then holster:Destroy() end if leftSword then leftSword:Destroy() end bladesNotActive = true if swordWalk then swordWalk:Stop() end if rightArm then if rightArm:FindFirstChild("TorsoGrip") then rightArm.TorsoGrip:Destroy() end end if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Sword.Touched:connect(blow)

local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local rightArm local holster local myTorso local leftArm
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") holster = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Holster") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") local myCF = myTorso.CFrame local duration = 0.75 --while duration > 0 do --myTorso.CFrame = myCF --wait() --duration = duration - wait() --end end
function onUnequipped() if vCharacter then if vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Holster") then vCharacter.Holster:Remove() end if vCharacter:FindFirstChild("LeftSword") then vCharacter.LeftSword:Remove() end end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
